data.name: Permission.CanBypassVerification
data.value: Allows players to bypass OpenPlanet signature mode verification.

data.name: Permission.CanUseControlPanel
data.value: Can access the OpenPlanet control panel.

data.name: ProhibitedSignatureMode
data.value: Prohibited OpenPlanet signature mode detected! Forced into spectator.

data.name: CorrectSignatureMode
data.value: Correct OpenPlanet signature mode selected! You can now play.

data.name: ProhibitedVersion
data.value: The OpenPlanet version you are using is too old! Forced into spectator.

data.name: IncorrectOpenPlanetConfig
data.value: The OpenPlanet configuration you are using is not allowed on this server! Forced into spectator.

data.name: Explanations.SwitchSignatureMode
data.value: In the Openplanet menu click $9dfDeveloper$g then $9dfSignature Mode$g.

data.name: Explanations.UpdateOpenPlanet
data.value: Go to the $L[https://openplanet.dev/download/next]$9dfOpenPlanet Download$L$g website and download the latest version.

data.name: Explanations.DisableOpenPlanet
data.value: Close the game. Hold $9dfPAUSE$fff and then start the game, keep holding $9dfPAUSE$g. When you see $cccPlease wait ..$fff or the $cccblack warning screen$fff, release $9dfPAUSE$fff.

data.name: OpenPlanetProhibited
data.value: The use of OpenPlanet is not allowed on this server! Forced into spectator.
